name: Void Beneath
description:
"Void Beneath" is a challenging roguelite platformer that combines platforming and shooting action. You play as a void wizard, delving into the depths of an ancient pyramid filled with dangerous enemies and obstacles. With each death being permanent, you must rely on your mastery of void magic and quick reflexes to survive. Battle against bosses and minions, navigate through challenging level, and uncover the secrets of the pyramid. As you progress, you will have the opportunity to unlock new skills and abilities that will aid you in future runs. With the void waiting for you at each turn, can you conquer the challenges and discover the truth beneath?

VB TEAM:

Adam Makowczenko - https://www.instagram.com/adampsuje/
[Art, Level Design, Gameplay]

Kyle Opperman - https://twitter.com/_kay0h
[Game programming, Level Design, Gameplay]

Kuba Stanek - https://www.instagram.com/kb_stnk/
[UI, Level Design, Gameplay]

Zain Wolf - https://zainwolfza.biglink.to/alles
[Sound & Music Design]
